cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Oversight and Reform on September 20, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 7988, Legislation to Name United States Post Offices

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 98 (Wednesday, June 8, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. RUIZ:
H.R. 7988 .
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, section 8, Clauses 1 and 18 of the United States
Constitution, to provide for the general welfare and make all
laws necessary and proper to carry out the powers of
Congress.
[Page H5409]
title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 79125 Corporate Centre Drive in La Quinta, California, as the "Corporal Hunter Lopez Memorial Post Office Building".
